Detail: Desktop client for forms/reports with linked tables on network share for 8 staff. Status and details on 120 cadets, including school, degree, GPA, year, Nav/Pilot, career field, physical, fitness scores
Air Force's first LMS, Meridian KSI web client with IIS, Oracle on failover .mil hosts at DISA Montgomery. I engineered, with $100K grant funding.
Injection system for EAMs from Pentagon/Joint Staff (as seen in movie Crimson Tide). Lead Programmer turned Configuration Manager and Project Manager. Lead consultant for replacement system (DIRECT).
Tracked status of network circuits Air Force-wide. Developed forms and worked issue tickets during alpha testing.
Packaged, installable Access program. Developed as SWDEV class project in basic computer officer training school in Biloxi. Also wired building and deployed AD/file server.
Access database, forms, and reports. Developed as SWDEV class project for student in class, interfacing with her team of employees. I developed, another tested, she documented.
Programmed tools part-time for team of round-the-clock shift workers, and eventually full-time supervising 6 on-shift admins.
UNIX shell and C programs consolidating raw data from mainframe, generating local production statistics and reports to support tasking changes.
Database system for senior staff managing team of 125 military intelligence operators, generated reports on personnel, classification, training, specialty team assignments, arrival/departure date.
Converted translit to cyrillic so plentiful DoD/DLI training documents could be read in native language format using KOI-8, CYR. and MS code pages. Challenging because 1 cyrillic can be 2-4 translit.
Created program so trainers could generate varying difficulty of source material for trainees to use, at variable speeds to ease entry for newcomers and challenge those ready for certification exam.

Overwrote bitmapped UpperCase character codes in memory, reading designed cyrillic characters from tape storage. No word processors for Russian at the time. Could create, save, and recall Russian files.
